37.name: Fosamax
37.orig_descr: Generic Fosamax is used for treating and preventing osteoporosis in certain patients.

101.name: Irbesartan
101.orig_descr: Irbesartan is used for treating high blood pressure. It may be used alone or with other blood pressure medicines.

167.name: Ansaid
167.orig_descr: Ansaid - eye drops, which are used to treat myosis during operations and prevention of the development of reactive postoperative inflammation of the eyes.

214.name: Canasa
214.orig_descr: Generic Canasa is used for treating various forms of mild to moderate inflammation of the colon.

238.name: Salicylic acid
238.orig_descr: Salicylic acid is a keratolytic (peeling agent). Salicylic acid causes shedding of the outer layer of skin. Salicylic acid topical (for the skin) is used in the treatment of acne, dandruff, seborrhea, or psoriasis, and to remove corns, calluses, and warts.

247.name: Pentasa
247.orig_descr: Generic Pentasa is used for treating and causing remission of various forms of mild to moderate ulcerative colitis (inflammation of the colon).

331.name: Lioresal
331.orig_descr: Generic Lioresal is used to treat and relieve spasms and cramping of muscles due to a variety of causes, including multiple sclerosis or brain or spinal cord injuries.

335.name: Tessalon
335.orig_descr: Tessalon is a non-narcotic cough medicine. It works by numbing the throat and lungs, making the cough reflex less active. Tessalon is used to relieve coughingNever suck or chew on a Tessalon capsule.

342.name: Savella
342.orig_descr: Generic Savella affects certain chemicals in the brain called neurotransmitters. An abnormality in these chemicals is thought to be related to fibromyalgia. Milnacipran is not used to treat depression but how it works in the body is similar to how some antidepressants work.Generic Savella is used to treat a chronic pain disorder called fibromyalgia.

369.name: Samsca
369.orig_descr: Tolvaptan reduces the level of a hormone that regulates the balance of water and salt (sodium) in the body. High levels of this hormone can cause an imbalance that results in low sodium levels and fluid retention. Tolvaptan is used to treat hyponatremia (low levels of sodium in your blood) in people with heart failure, and certain hormonal imbalances. Tolvaptan improves urine flow without causing the body to lose too much sodium as you urinate.

452.name: Sanctura XR
452.orig_descr: Trospium Extended-Release Capsules is a muscarinic antagonist indicated for the treatment of overactive bladder (OAB) with symptoms of urge urinary incontinence, urgency, and urinary frequency.

471.name: Asacol
471.orig_descr: Generic Asacol is used for treating and causing remission of various forms of mild to moderate ulcerative colitis (inflammation of the colon).
